SEARCH
Package com.example.eventbooking.Events.EventData

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventbooking.Events.EventData.Event
public class Event extends Object
The Event class represents an event in the system, encapsulating details such as title, description, location, maximum participants, and lists for participant statuses (e.g., accepted, canceled). This class provides methods for managing event data and interacting with Firebase services for storage, retrieval, and updates.

    • Event

      public Event()

      public Event(int eventID)

    • Event

      public Event(String eventId, String eventTitle, String description, String imageUrl, long timestamp, String locationstr, int maxParticipants, String organizerId)
      Constructs an Event with specific parameters.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier of the event.
      eventTitle - The title of the event.
      description - The description of the event.
      imageUrl - The URL of the event image.
      timestamp - The timestamp of the event.
      locationstr - The location of the event.
      maxParticipants - The maximum number of participants allowed.
      organizerId - The ID of the organizer for this event.

    • cancelParticipant

      public void cancelParticipant(String entrantId)
      Cancels a participant's entry, moving their ID to the canceled list and removing them from the accepted list.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The ID of the participant to cancel.

    • signUpParticipant

      public void signUpParticipant(String entrantId)
      Signs up a participant by adding their ID to the signed-up list and removing them from the accepted list.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The ID of the participant to sign up.
